chapter.text: 97|1|Hamono Mo on [Qur'on]-ro dar saʙi qadr nozil kardem
97|2|Va tu ci doni saʙi qadr cist
97|3|Saʙi qadr ʙehtar az hazor moh ast
97|4|Faristagon va Ruh [Caʙrail] dar on [saʙ] ʙa farmoni Parvardigorason ʙaroi [ancomi] har kore nozil mesavand
97|5|[On saʙ] To tului facr salomat [va rahmat] ʙosad
